code: import React,{useState}from'react';import styles from'./LoginPage.module.css';import api from'../../api';import{Navigate,useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const LoginPage=()=>{const[userData,setUserData]=useState({email:' ',password:' '});const navigate=useNavigate();const handleUserLogIn=async e=>{e.preventDefault();localStorage.removeItem('user_token');const response=await api.post('/authorize',userData);const{token}=response.data;localStorage.setItem('user_token',token);console.log(response.data);navigate('/home');};const handleChange=e=>{setUserData({...userData,[e.target.name]:e.target.value});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("form",{className:styles.formContainer,onSubmit:handleUserLogIn,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:styles.title,children:"Authorizing Page"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{className:styles.label,children:"Email: "}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",name:"email",value:userData.email,onChange:handleChange,className:styles.inputField}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{className:styles.label,children:"Password: "}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",name:"password",value:userData.password,onChange:handleChange,className:styles.inputField}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/register",children:"Create a new account"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:styles.submitButton,children:"Log in"})]})});};export default LoginPage;
